item.title: Afforestation
item.description: One of the foundamental ideas on which Rotary is built is that projects should be sustainable. That’s why we - Rotary Club Sofia Triaditsa - are actively involved in preservation of our environment. We had participated in numerous iniciatives for afforistation and cultivating parks. The trees provide us with oxygen and shade. They prevent landslides but are also play a crucial part of natural wildlife ecosystems. They are an integral part of preserving the water cycles and averting droughts.

item.title: Ambliopia screening
item.description: The amblyopia is a condition of a reduced eyesight. It is also known as “lazy eye”. By its nature it is not an eye disease but a neurological one. With it one eye becomes dominant and the brain rejects the image received by the other one. Diagnosis and treatment As with any other disease, the sooner it is found - the better. This especially the case with ambliopia. Most of the times there are no visible indicators that someone has it.

item.title: Our story
item.description: We are a group of friends, gathered by the common desire to do good. We take our causes to the heart and we put a lot of passion in our work achieving them. Our selfless service to the community provides us both with a goal and a velocoty. We find real joy when we provide for the others. If this calls home to you, please contact us.

item.title: Rotary Foundation
item.description: The Rotary Foundation of Rotary International was founded in 1917 as a donation fund. The Congress in 1928 named it the Rotary Foundation. In 1931, the Foundation became a corporation, acting as a trustee and investment adviser, and in 1983 it was transformed into a non-profit corporation under the laws of Illinois, USA. The Rotary Foundation is funded solely by voluntary donations from Rotarians and Rotary friends. It is managed by its trustees solely for charitable and educational purposes, in accordance with its registration and statutes.

item.title: Planting of trees in Sofia
item.description: Diligent Rotarians planted 55 trees in the capital On March 19, 2017, members of Rotary Club Sofia Tangra, Rotary Club Sofia Vazrazhdane and Preliminary Rotary Club Sofia Triaditsa completed their joint project for afforestation and refreshment of green areas in Sofia. The selfless Rotarians planted 55 trees in Knyazhevska Garden, the yard of Alexandrovska Hospital and Yuzhen Park. The project was fully funded by the three Sofia clubs. More than thirty Rotarians joined the initiative.
